blogPost.title: Elon Musk’s decision to not join Twitter’s board of directors has company employees and analysts foreseeing a potential fracas with the world’s richest man #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/icmlCgaFMD https://t.co/LkrkmCk7oR
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: イーロン・マスクがツイッターの取締役会に参加しないことを決めたことで、同社の社員やアナリストは世界一の富豪との騒動の可能性を予見している #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/icmlCgaFMD https://t.co/LkrkmCk7oR
埃隆-马斯克决定不加入Twitter的董事会，公司员工和分析师预见到了与世界首富的潜在争吵#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/icmlCgaFMD https://t.co/LkrkmCk7oR
埃隆-馬斯克決定不加入Twitter的董事會，公司員工和分析師預見到了與世界首富的潛在爭吵#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/icmlCgaFMD https://t.co/LkrkmCk7oR

previous.title: New York Lt. Gov. Brian Benjamin resigned after being arrested in connection with an alleged bribery scheme and subsequent coverup while he was being vetted to join the administration of Gov. Kathy Hochul https://t.co/GQpAeg9fWU

localize.full_text: ニューヨーク州副知事Brian Benjaminは、Kathy Hochul知事の政権に加わるための審査中に贈収賄疑惑とその後の隠蔽工作に関連して逮捕され、辞任したhttps://t.co/GQpAeg9fWU。
纽约州副州长布莱恩-本杰明因涉嫌贿赂计划和随后的掩饰而被捕，他在被审查加入州长凯西-霍楚尔的政府时辞职 https://t.co/GQpAeg9fWU
紐約州副州長布萊恩-本傑明因涉嫌賄賂計劃和隨後的掩飾而被捕，他在被審查加入州長凱西-霍楚爾的政府時辭職 https://t.co/GQpAeg9fWU

next.title: Obituary: Actor and comedian Gilbert Gottfried, who was known for his distinctive voice, has died at the age of 67 https://t.co/RW6D9fw9oZ

讣告。以独特嗓音著称的演员和喜剧演员吉尔伯特-戈特弗里德已经去世，享年67岁 https://t.co/RW6D9fw9oZ
